DOC.brief_title: Carboplatin Plus Topotecan Treating Patients With Relapsed Acute Myelogenous Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine efficacy 5-day continuous infusion carboplatin topotecan patient relapse refractory acute myelogenous leukemia ( AML ) . II . Assess toxic effect treatment patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive continuous intravenous infusion topotecan carboplatin 5 day . Treatment repeat every 3-4 week induction ( two course ) every 6-10 week consolidation . No four course treatment give . Patients follow every 6 month 5 year .
